alert.note: Alert for Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 7:07PM CDT until June 29 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Sheridan County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 645 PM MDT. * At 607 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Rushville, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rushville, Clinton, Highway 250 crossing the Niobrara River and Walgren Lake State Recreation Area. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 90 and 97. Highway 250 between mile markers 37 and 48. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
